Projects.Name: IT Company Website
Projects.Description: The main website for FortisureIT, complete with an email mailer powered by Node.js

Projects.Name: Restaurant Mapping Site
Projects.Description: A prototype mapping site made using React for the Front-End and a Node.js Server to list out nearby restaurant data from a MySQL database.

Projects.Name: PHP E-Commerce Site
Projects.Description: This is a prototype PHP E-Commerce website taking advantage Object Oriented PHP, and AJAX to make the website dynamic.

TimeLine.Title: Lead Web Developer
TimeLine.Description: Manages development concerning web-based applications and software. Makes important decisions with team regarding development for our clients, and curriculum for our training program. Reviews code, Develops alongside, and trains for Jr. Developers.

Projects.title: Main Company Website
Projects.details: Designed and Implemented a new company website using modern CSS best practices and CSS Grid. It uses Express.js to validate and sanitize forms on the backend, and to send custom emails using the Mailjet API.

Projects.title: Restaurant Mapping Site
Projects.details: A React.js site that uses a MySQL database of local restaurants to populate pins on the Google Maps API. The site connects to the database using a custom Node.js API.

Projects.title: PHP E-Commerce Site
Projects.details: A PHP E-Commerce site using Object Oriented PHP. Combining a complex relational MySQL database, with AJAX, and JavaScript made a very dynamic and reliable E-Commerce experience.

Projects.title: Developer Curriculum
Projects.details: Worked as part of a team to create content for and collaborate on a new 8-week curriculum. The curriculum covers HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Apache and hosting a web site on a Linux VM.

TimeLine.Title: Freelance Web Developer
TimeLine.Description: Created many Websites and projects for clients, friends, and family Worked productive and positive to design, code, test, report, and debug operations. Successfully identified, diagnosed, and fixed website problems, including broken links, typographical errors, and formatting issues. Worked to assess competing websites in regards to content, look, and feel. Consistently learning the top methods and frameworks.
